segments.advisor_message: Alright, so tell me, what are you looking to get out of this session? Any specific goals on your mind?
segments.client_message: Oh yeah, um, I'm really excited about how much my investments can grow! Like, I want to, you know, make the most of it and see those numbers go up, right?

segments.advisor_message: That sounds promising! Do you have any particular investment strategies or areas you're interested in?
segments.client_message: Well, uh, I was thinking maybe like, stocks? I’ve heard that they can, you know, really take off if you pick the right ones. It’s just super exciting to think about!

segments.advisor_message: Absolutely! Stocks can be great. It’s all about timing and research. Any sources of information you've looked into to help guide you?
segments.client_message: I’ve been reading a few articles online and watching, um, YouTube videos, but I'm no expert. Just want to make sure I’m making smart moves with my money, you know?
